scripts.dev:angular: export BUILD_ENV=dev && export BUILD_TARGET=angular && webpack-dev-server --color --config webpack.conf.js
scripts.dev:angular:build: export BUILD_ENV=dev && export BUILD_TARGET=angular && webpack --config webpack.conf.js
scripts.prod:angular: export BUILD_ENV=prod && export BUILD_TARGET=angular && webpack --config webpack.conf.js
scripts.win:dev:angular: set BUILD_ENV=dev && set BUILD_TARGET=angular && webpack-dev-server --color --config webpack.conf.js
scripts.win:prod:angular: set BUILD_ENV=prod && set BUILD_TARGET=angular && webpack --config webpack.conf.js
scripts.win:dev:angular:build: set BUILD_ENV=dev && set BUILD_TARGET=angular && webpack --config webpack.conf.js
